resources.string: Location is required to get the weather for your area.
Jog On has been designed to provide suggestions on weather conditions and appropriate clothing for running.

You can select a time window to go for a run and customise your weather preferences.\n\nJog On will then display the current weather conditions and display a list of the best times for your run and suggestions on what to wear.

From the Home page, you can click on the Settings cog in the top right.

You can select your preferred time window from a defined list or specify your own time window.

Click save to apply changes and click the Home icon to return to the main page.

From the Home page, you can click on the Settings cog in the top right.

You can select your preferred weather conditions. Select if you want the results arranged by nearest time or by your own preference

If selecting your own preferences, drag and drop the various weather conditions in order of preference, with the most preferred at the top and least at the bottom.

Click save to apply changes and click the Home icon to return to the main page
Click on the email icon in the menu bar to contact the developer with any questions, issues, feedback or suggestions.
